description.value:
Recipe Price 75 sp
Ingredients 2 basic, 2 special
Preparation DC 19 Cooking Lore, DC 21 Survival
Requirements Basic Kitchen
Favorite Meal The bonuses includes checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}.

A local favorite of folks in Grimcity, a Grimmy Cheesesteak is typically a toasted, buttered baguette that is loaded with marinated, grilled meat (usually beef, but many variants exist), then melted cheese, onions and a variety of ingredients, served with fries. The meal is fast and simple, but a staple for coworkers to commiserate over fond times. It is also said to really stoke the emotions in its consumer.

Upon eating the meal, you gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie}, and Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}, or increase any existing item bonus by that amount. Its effects last for 24 hours, or until you make your next daily preparations, whichever comes first.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.Item.k7ZpVt68eBugVMMK]{Effect: Grimmy Cheesesteak}

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.Item.yHIf9Q1LorL8nLWy]{Effect: Grimmy Cheesesteak (Favorite)}
